translations.translation: and nubile maidens of similar age,
And graceful maidens of the same age,
and youthful maidens of like age,
maidens with pears-shaped breasts who are of equal age (to their spouses)
And maidens of a single age.
And Kawa`ib Atrab,
And voluptuous women of equal age;
and maidens with swelling breasts, like of age,
And voluptuous women of equal age;
and young maidens of equal age,
And full-breasted maidens of equal age.
and buxom maidens of a like age,
And voluptuous women of equal age;
And young full-breasted (mature) maidens of equal age;
curvaceous (virgins), of equal age
And splendid spouses, well matched.
And full-breasted [companions] of equal age
[78:33] and buxom maidens (kawā‘ib is the plural of kā‘ib) of equal age (atrāb is the plural of tirb),
And maidens for companions) who are all of the same age: 33 years of age,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَاباً } الكَواعِبُ: النَّواهدُ
 والأَترابُ: المُسْتَوَياتُ في الأَسنانِ

translations.translation:
And His saying, "And {they will compete} in [good] deeds" - the [good] deeds are the [acts of] obedience.


The atrab are the level surfaces of the teeth.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَ } إن لهم فيها أزواجاً { كَوَاعِبَ } نواهد
 استدارة ثديهن مثل الرمان { أَتْرَاباً } [النبأ: 33] أبكاراً

[الرحمن: 56]

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وكواعبَ } نساء نواهِد
 وهي مَن لم تسقط ثديها لصغرٍ
 { أتراباً } أي: لَدَاتٍ مستوياتٍ في السنّ
